def_cn: (尸体或死去的植物）腐烂，腐朽，腐败;(牙齿）遭蛀蚀
def_en: When something such as a dead body, a dead plant, or a tooth decays, it is gradually destroyed by a natural process.

def_cn: (社会、制度、机构等）衰败，衰退，衰落
def_en: If something such as a society, system, or institution decays, it gradually becomes weaker or its condition gets worse.
